seo.title: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Food & Gourmet Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: Food enthusiasts expect fast, trustworthy stores. See how 73 Shopify food & gourmet stores perform on pagespeed score. Median: 52, Top 10%: 67. Free benchmarks.
keywords: best pagespeed score for food stores
how to improve pagespeed score shopify

key_findings: The average Food & Gourmet store scores 49 on PageSpeed, falling into Google's "poor" category
Top 10% of stores achieve scores of 67+, giving them a significant competitive advantage
There's a 39 point gap between top and bottom performers in this niche
Some stores in this niche fall below Google's minimum acceptable threshold
Source: Boostra analysis of 73 Shopify food & gourmet stores, 2026-01-04.
how_to_improve: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight
Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets
Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code
Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store
Minimize main-thread work by deferring non-critical JavaScript
Reduce the impact of third-party scripts like analytics and chat widgets
Consider a performance-focused Shopify theme if your current theme is bloated

jsonld.name: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Food & Gourmet Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 73 Shopify stores in the food and beverages industry, measuring pagespeed score.

acceptedAnswer.text: PageSpeed Score is Google's comprehensive performance metric (0-100) that evaluates your site's speed and user experience. Higher scores correlate with better SEO rankings and conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: Why does PageSpeed Score matter for food & gourmet stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Food ecommerce competes with the instant gratification of local stores. A fast, efficient online experience helps justify the wait time for delivery.

mainEntity.name: What is a good PageSpeed Score for Shopify food & gourmet stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 73 Shopify food & gourmet stores, the median pagespeed score is 52. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 67. Scores of 90+ are considered 'good', 50-89 'needs improvement', and below 50 'poor'.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my food & gourmet store's PageSpeed Score?

acceptedAnswer.text: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight. Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets. Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code. Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store. For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other food & gourmet stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your pagespeed score against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 52 (the median), you're in the top half of food & gourmet stores. If you're better than 67, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
